title: T206 Kelley and Chase Blue Port - PSA 3
author: ParachromBleu

posts.post_title: T206 Kelley and Chase Blue Port - PSA 3
posts.post_content:
For sale are two PSA 3 T206s:

Kelley Piedmont 350 - $220 SOLD
Chase blue port Piedmont 350-460 - $145

Chase has a very faint horizontal crease on his shirt, in between first and second buttons from the bottom. Even in-hand this is hard to see.

Prices are net to me and include USPS tracked First Class in a bubble mailer. Numerous payment methods accepted.
